programs.name: Social Winter of Code
programs.description: An open-source program that aims to bring students into the world of open source development.

programs.name: GirlScript Summer of Code
programs.description: A three-month long open-source program conducted by GirlScript Foundation.

programs.name: Google Summer of Code
programs.description: A global program focused on bringing more student developers into open source software development.

programs.name: Hacktoberfest
programs.description: A month-long celebration of open source software run by DigitalOcean. Contributing to any open source project counts!

programs.name: MLH Fellowship
programs.description: A remote internship alternative for aspiring software engineers. You'll contribute to real open source projects.

programs.name: Outreachy
programs.description: Internships for people subject to systemic bias and impacted by underrepresentation in the technical industry.
